Reviews.Title: UNICAM defunk
Reviews.Author: Robert Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I received the camera doubled box (a good thing) ; open the original container read the instructions and proceeded to set it up; charged the unieye camera, after the charge, I downloaded the app, I turn on the unieye camera waited for the wifi signal to come on, went to iPhone settings and changed wifi to unieye camera, then I went to the app and selected the unieye camera: Nothing happens, I get a message to go to settings and select the camera (which, I already did per instructions manual). I tried everything bit it does not work, I even tried it on my iPad and I get the same results.I emailed Amazon with the issue and vendor/seller; the seller sends me the same instructions as the manual, they even sent pictures how it's suppose to look. It still does not work. What does it take for Amazon to have the seller send my a return label so I can send it back?!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: wilspula
Reviews.Content: Just took this camera to Maui and let me tell you-*it is light*great video image*comes with so many mount*WIFI to your phone so you can watch what video you are taking or what is ine your album.If you are having troble with the phone app make sure you have the right app...i saw 6 different free app and i tried all of them till i got the one that works with my phone..The only issue is i dont know how much power i have right on the camera but it still have power after 2 days...
